precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with no active windows open.
action: Right Click on an empty area of the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: A context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the mouse cursor will change to an hourglass, indicating that the Display Properties window is loading.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will update to show the 'Screen Saver' tab. A dropdown menu with screen saver options, a monitor image, and a 'Wait' field will appear. The 'Settings', 'Preview', and 'Power' buttons will become visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the drop-down button of the 'Screen saver' drop-down list.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' drop-down menu will expand, displaying a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The Display Properties window is open with the 'Screen Saver' tab selected.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become disabled.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible within the "Monitor power" section.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the drop-down arrow for the "Turn off monitor" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals and a "Never" option.

precondition: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu in the 'Power Options Properties' window is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and 'Never' will be displayed as the selected option for 'Turn off monitor'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu displays "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab.
